entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gameti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gameti Airport 1:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -37.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -41.3°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32 except minus 36 over northwestern sections. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32 except minus 36 over northwestern sections. Wind chill minus 51 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
